title: Half Light

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Intimidate. They are roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, you begin to hunt your prey. All players who you intimidated in the past have their defense reduced by one stage permanently.
Kill Note Addition:
*"YOU'RE NEXT."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4916
*Let the body take control. Threaten people. See the danger lurking in the dim light.*
